remarks:
Addition to both sides of 'less than'.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) 

---

 Addition to both sides of 'less than'.  Part of definition 11.2.7(vi) of [HoTT], p.  (varies).  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: ltadd1 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A < B <-> ( A + C ) < ( B + C ) ) ) $.
